meanings.definition: A person who has an extremely large amount of money.
meanings.sent1: The zillionaire donated a huge sum to the charity.
meanings.sent2: The local zillionaire owns multiple mansions and luxury cars.
meanings.sent3: The zillionaire's wallet was so full, it needed its own zip code!
meanings.sent4: Compared to the zillionaire, I felt like a pauper.
meanings.sent5: The zillionaire's wealth was as vast as the ocean.

meanings.definition: Having an extremely large amount of money.
meanings.sent1: The extravagant party was hosted by a zillionaire businessman.
meanings.sent2: She lived in a zillionaire neighborhood filled with opulent houses.
meanings.sent3: The zillionaire cake was so big, it needed a crane to cut it!
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a zillionaire collection of designer labels.
meanings.sent5: The mansion was decorated in zillionaire style, with gold everywhere.
